com.vectorprint.report.itext.style

Class DefaultStylerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.DefaultStylerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentAware, ImageLoaderAware, LayerManagerAware, StylerFactory

    public class DefaultStylerFactory
extends Object
implements StylerFactory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULTDOCUMENTSETTINGS
      The default document will be A4 with margins of 25 mm when a setting ReportConstants.DOCUMENTSETTINGS is not defined
      static String PRESTYLERS
      name of the optional property containing stylers that will be executed before all other stylers
      static String POSTSTYLERS
      name of the optional property containing stylers that will be executed after all other stylers
      static String DOFIRSTLAST
      name of the boolean setting use PRESTYLERS and POSTSTYLERS or not
      static String PAGESTYLERS
      name of the optional property containing advanced stylers that will be executed for each page
      static String STYLERPACKAGENAME
      put your own stylers in this package
